product_name: HP Chromebook x360 14 inch FHD IPS Touch 2-in-1 Laptop Intel Processor N100 4GB RAM 64GB eMMC Sky Blue
short_description: HP Chromebook

product_name: HP Chromebook 14 inch Laptop Intel Processor N200 4GB RAM 128GB UFS Glacier Silver
short_description: Take on the day with the performance of an Intel processor paired with the easy to use and easy to love Chrome OS. With plenty of memory and wireless connectivity it is easy to check everything off your list. HP Fast Charge allows for faster boot up and long battery life so you can stay connected all day. Connect with confidence and present your best self with the high quality camera with temporal noise reduction and integrated dual array digital microphones. Chat or collaborate with friends using the high quality camera and keep your private moments private with the easy to access camera privacy shutter when not in-use. With the built-in security of this HP Chromebook you can always connect with peace of mind. With the large 14 inch diagonal display and dual stereo speakers, you will be ready to dive into all your shows when you need to unwind. Immerse yourself in the entertainment with smooth streaming and wireless connectivity. Plus, the slim and sleek design is ready to match your style– this HP Chromebook was designed so you can unwind. The better choice for a brighter tomorrow, the HP Chromebook is designed to be more sustainable using ocean-bound plastic, post-consumer recycled plastics and recycled aluminum. With EPEAT Gold with Climate+ and ENERGY STAR certified design, you can be confident your Chromebook does good things for the planet, while doing amazing things for you.

product_name: ASUS Chromebook CM30 10.5 inch WUXGA Touch 2-in-1 Tablet MediaTek Kompanio 520 8GB RAM 128GB eMMC Stylus Included Fog Silver
short_description: ASUS Chromebook CM30 Detachable is the perfect portable companion for study, work, and play, with a versatile 2-in-1 design that allows it to transform seamlessly between laptop and tablet. Built to military-grade standards, it also features a free-angle adjustable stand cover and full-size detachable keyboard — all to facilitate productivity, flexibility and comfort. A 2-way push-pop garaged stylus and dual camera enable creativity, and up to 12 hours* of battery life allows the user to explore the world without limits.      *Battery life may vary based on device and upon usage and other conditions.

product_name: Apple MacBook Air 13.3 inch Laptop - Space Gray, M1 Chip, Built for Apple Intelligence, 8GB RAM, 256GB storage
short_description: Introducing The 13-inch MacBook Air with the Apple M1 chip is incredibly thin and light with a silent fanless design. It delivers remarkable performance and up to 18 hours of battery life. And it has a beautiful Retina display for super sharp text and vibrant colors. Amazing performance, Unbeatable price. It's a laptop you’re going to love!

product_name: HP 15.6 inch Laptop Intel Core i5-1235U 8GB RAM 256GB SSD Spruce Blue
short_description: Designed to keep you productive and entertained from anywhere, the HP 15.6 inch Laptop PC combines long lasting battery life with a thin and portable, micro-edge bezel design. With a thin and light design, take this PC anywhere. Do more with a micro-edge FHD display and enjoy vivid and flicker-free images. Tackle your busiest days with the performance of a 12th Generation Intel Core processor. Save more of what you love with abundant storage for all your photos, videos and documents. With a long battery life and fast-charge technology, this laptop lets you work, watch, and stay connected all day. Integrated precision touchpad with multi-touch support speeds up both navigation and productivity. The HP 15.6 inch Laptop is EPEAT Silver registered and ENERGY STAR certified. And it contains sustainable, post-consumer recycled plastics.

product_name: HP Victus 15.6 inch FHD IPS 144Hz Gaming Laptop AMD Ryzen 5-8645HS NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4050 8GB DDR5 512GB SSD Mica Silver (2024)
short_description: The Victus 15.6" Gaming Laptop is packed with the power of a desktop to keep up with the biggest games. You're ready to roll with a top-of-the-line processing AMD CPU and NVIDIA GeForce RTX graphics, with OMEN Gaming Hub helping to push the performance of both even farther. The updated thermal design keeps everything chill from max power gaming to after hours streaming. Open up your game with a much bigger touchpad, integrated keyboard and an HD Camera that features Temporal Noise Reduction for that crisp clarity on all your streams or calls. The AMD Ryzen™ 5 8645HS ushers in the speed for gamers and creators with the power to tackle any game. An advanced processor for everyone that extends AMD performance to power your PC. The NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4050 GPU offers ultra-high FPS gaming, revolutionary new ways to create, and unprecedented workflow acceleration. AMD FreeSync Premium Technology gives you perfectly smooth gameplay and peak performance. You'll be able to game confidently with a high refresh rate, low framerate compensation, and low latency. Reduce frustrating lag and image ghosting with a display that combines a 144Hz refresh rate and 1080p Full High Definition resolution for smooth, crisp gameplay.  Enjoy faster speeds, improved performance and greater capacity with Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth® 5.3 wireless card. Recharge your battery from 0 to 50% in approximately 30 minutes.

product_name: HP 14 inch Laptop Intel Core i3-N305 8GB RAM 256GB SSD Moonlight Blue
short_description: When the struggle is real, get real power with the HP 14 inch Laptop PC. Packing everything from the latest Intel processor, ample storage, and a sustainable design, it has never been easier to respect the planet and your budget. Take on your day and go beyond just raw processor speed with an Intel Core processor. Long-lasting battery life & HP Fast Charge help you stay in the zone longer. Get lost in a remarkable entertainment experience as the display delivers boosted definition and crisp quality. With an 84% screen-to-body ratio, you'll always have a great view of your favorite content. Stay in your flow with plenty of ports to connect your devices. This PC is built to keep you in your flow, wherever that might be. Get lost in a remarkable entertainment experience as the display delivers boosted definition and crisp quality. With an 84% screen-to-body ratio, you'll always have a great view of your favorite content. Stay in your flow with plenty of ports to connect your devices. This PC is built to keep you in your flow, wherever that might be.

product_name: Acer Aspire 3, 15.6" FHD Display, AMD Ryzen 7 5700U Processor, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, Windows 11 Home
short_description: Choose the ready-to-go Aspire 3 with the Ryzen™ 7 Series Processors made for practical multitasking and productivity. With ease-of-use at its core, this family-friendly laptop is ready when you are. This Aspire 3 can tackle any job no matter how complex. Creativity soars to new heights with sharp, crisp visuals showcased on the 15.6" Full HD screen, while the thin bezel provides you more space to work with wherever inspiration strikes. It’s the perfect companion to take with you wherever you go!

product_name: Acer Chromebook 315 15.6 inch Laptop Intel Processor N4500 4GB RAM 64GB eMMC Pure Silver
short_description: The Acer Chromebook 315 features a 15.6" anti-glare screen designed to let you get more done, no matter where you are. You'll stay focused in either the classroom or the office with a dedicated number pad, a fast processor, and an ecofriendly OceanGlass touchpad. Recognized as the perfect multi-media companion, this special machine is super thin, extra light and delivers unmatched value in today’s fast-paced, technology-driven world. It features an impressive HDR camera, fast wireless connectivity and long-lasting battery life, so you can run your favorite Google apps or access your photos, videos, music and documents—all day long.

product_name: ASUS 23.8 inch FHD IPS Touch All-in-One Desktop Intel Core i5-1235U 8GB RAM 512GB SSD White
short_description: ASUS A3402 All-in-One PC features an Intel® Core™ i5-1235U Processor for decent computing performance, perfect for home or office. The slim bezel NanoEdge design results in an up to 88% screen-to-body ratio for expansive productivity. This beautiful, broad display benefits from 100% sRGB color gamut and 178° wide-view technology for truly great imagery. Combined with its advanced ASUS SonicMaster Premium audio — featuring Dolby® Atmos and two-way AI-powered Noise-Canceling — ASUS A3402 immerses you in striking visuals and superb sound for the ultimate entertainment experience.

product_name: Blackview Mini PC 16GB DDR4 RAM 512GB Intel 12th Gen N95 3.4GHz 4K UHD Mini Desktop Windows 11 Pro, Mini Gaming Computer Dual HDMI, MP60 Black
short_description: Blackview MP60 Mini PC, a compact 5" x 5" x 2.1" dynamo that effortlessly fits any workspace.     Powered by an Intel 12th Gen N95 Processor, this mini computer results in significant improvements in both performance and efficiency. Up to 16GB of DDR4 operation memory and 512GB solid-state drives, the mini desktop PC gives ample room for a bulk of valuable multimedia files. Driven by Windows 11 Pro, this mini desktop tower features that help you secure your devices, data, and applications and work more efficiently. With USB ports, dual 4K HDMI outputs, Gigabit Ethernet, and dual-band WiFi for seamless connectivity. With Intel UHD Graphics at 450MHz (Burst Frequency 750MHz), this small computer offers stunning 4K visuals and supports dual 4K monitors. Mount the mini computer effortlessly using the included VESA bracket to maximize your desk area. Elevate your productivity and space efficiency with the MP60 Mini PC - your compact powerhouse for work and entertainment. Ideal gift for Back to School/Christmas gift.

product_name: Restored HP Chromebook 11.6-inch Intel Celeron 4GB RAM 16GB 2024 Latest OS Bundle: USA Essentials Bluetooth/Wireless Airbuds, Wireless Mouse By 2 Day Express (Refurbished)
short_description: OverviewThis Chromebook was built for everything you do online. Chrome OS makes getting connected and getting things done effortless. It’s easy to use, fun to show off, and perfectly portable with power to last all day. Amazing, isn’t it?FeaturesDesigned to moveThe slim design and 12 hours and 45 minutes of battery life give you attractive power and superb all-day portability, perfect to take along and show off wherever you go.Chrome OSChromebooks run Chrome OS for a fast, simple, secure computing experience. It loads in seconds and gives you easy access to all your Android apps and Google Drive content.Designed to moveWith an 11.6-inch diagonal HD display, you can comfortably enjoy the view from any angle with perfect clarity and great video quality.Brilliance on displayThe slim design and up to 11 hours and 30 minutes of battery life give you attractive power with superb portabilitySoftware includedGoogle Drive™Disclaimers Testing conducted by HP using Google Chrome OS power LoadTest. Battery life will vary and the maximum capacity of the battery will naturally decrease with time and usage. See http://www.chromium.org/chromium-os/testing/power-testing for test details. High-definition (HD) content is required to view HD images.

product_name: Acer Aspire 3, 15.6" Full HD Display, Intel Core i3-N305, Intel UHD Graphics, 8GB LPDDR5 Onboard Memory, 128GB Universal Flash Onboard Storage, Windows 11 Home in S mode
short_description: Choose the ready-to-go Aspire 3 with the Intel Core i3 processor and Intel UHD graphics inside - made for performance and productivity. With ease-of-use at its core, this family-friendly laptop is ready when you are. With Windows 11 Home in S mode, you’ll experience fast start-ups, a familiar yet expanded Start menu, and great new ways to get stuff done. And with automatic updates enabled, you get all the latest features and security hassle-free. Work, play and share all in one device!
